website_summaries.verdict: Though they don't quite live up to the comfort of others on our list, the Arizona Essentials are practical for some men thanks in part to their budget-friendly price.
pros: In spite of being made of synthetic materials and coming at a fraction of the price of others by the brand, these Birkenstocks offer similar construction, support, and style as pricier options
A good pick for men who don't wear leather
cons: Not quite as comfortable as traditional Birkenstocks
Footbed gets somewhat slippery when wet

customer_reviews.title: Fart noises all day
customer_reviews.text: If you want to walk around making fart noises with your shoes, 10/10 buy these
customer_reviews.author: chera

customer_reviews.title: Narrow works for wide for these adjustable Birkes
customer_reviews.text: If you're an in-between size, maybe this will help. I wear 7.5 size shoes, and I own many pairs of regular Birkenstock sandals that are 38 medium/wide (the outlined footprint on the cork). However, I buy size 39 Birkenstock hiking boots. For Crocs I purchase size 8. After searching a bit, I realized that there are no WIDE size 38 or 39 for these sandals, and one reviewer incorrectly said that these are not adjustable. I purchased size 38, and though these are called narrow, they are very comfortable for my wide feet. I did not need to adjust the buckles, but I could if desired. I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amysan

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: I have many pairs of Birkenstocks and thought this would be a good one for when I take my dog swimming. My feet kept getting wet so I thought this to be the answer. Nope... once your feet are wet they slip terrible inside the shoe and you really have to be careful not to slip and fall.
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: An excellent choice!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pairs of the classic Arizona and when I saw these I knew I wanted to give them a try. If you have had classic birks you understand how awful it is when they get wet. I’m working seasonally in Alaska this summer and needed something that is okay with the moisture up here. I’ve had these for about a month now and I love them. The EVA foam is actually softer and more comfortable than the cork in my opinion and they are perfect when wet. They weigh nothing. So lightweight and easy. Plus they have all of the looks of the Birkies you love so much. Half the price too. Can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof is a plus! Don't worry about the material.
customer_reviews.text: I love these because they are light rubber, monochrome black, a bit slimmer than regular birkentosks, and I can wear them near or in the water unlike regular ones! At first I was shocked because they seemed light and flimsy but they can take a beating and may last longer than the regular ones in some cases. This photo is after 2 yrs of use by the way!
customer_reviews.author: Aba KH

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Had less than two months and they ripped. It's a shame because they were very comfortable but quality is apparently lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Jose E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes for awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews but with all of the mixed reviews on this product I wanted to make sure I did! I absolutely love these!! They are so comfy and cute! Definitely seem like they run true to size. Couple weeks in wearing them non stop every day and still absolutely loving them!!
customer_reviews.author: Liss

customer_reviews.title: Cheap styrofoam knockoff!
customer_reviews.text: These are basically a cheap knockoff of the ones currently on sale in department stores. They don’t feel like they are made of the same material at all, these feel like styrofoam! I even brought them with me to Nordstrom to compare. Extremely disappointed, these are being returned!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality
customer_reviews.text: Rips so easily. Literally crying summer hasn’t even came yet and they are on the verge of ripping. Exactly 3 months and it’s gone. I thought they would be more durable especially that target has knock off ones.
customer_reviews.author: OLGA LINSKY

customer_reviews.title: Shoe tore within days
customer_reviews.text: I immediately loved these sandals as soon as I started wearing them- comfortable, stylish, etc. I took them with on a vacation to Michigan and within a couple days of wearing them a tear developed where the strap connects to the shoe. Very disappointed. These shoes should not tear that quickly with gentle wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst product I’ve ever bought very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in these shoes got June 5 th for my daughters Birthday and gave them to her June 10th look at them Ithey are splitting at the toes
customer_reviews.author: Jim Warren

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock??? Where’s the quality??
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible! What happened to the quality of the water shoes. I had awesome Birkenstock water shoes that lasted years and years. Finally thought I would buy another pair and within a month they started falling apart. Both shoes, same place. Been wearing them like they are because it’s too late to return them and I’m not going to buy another pair of these. Going to look at another brand to buy after all these years. I loved my other ones. Lasted almost 10 years. What happened???
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: SHAME ON YOU BIRKENSTOCK!!!
customer_reviews.text: SHAME SHAME ON YOU BIRKENSTOCK FOR CHARGING SO MUCH FOR A PIECE OF CR*P & YOU KNOW IT!! THIS IS A PIECE OF JUNK!! I DON'T EXPECT IT TO LAST MORE THAN A COUPLE USES. I WILL NEVER BUY BIRKENSTOCK'S AGAIN & IT WAS MY MOST FAVORITE SHOE FOR MANY MANY YEARS!! SO NOW I KNOW WHAT YOU THINK OF YOUR CUSTOMERS! I would send it BACK, BUT I severely sprained my foot I need an arch supportive shoe that I knew would fit me that I could take showers in. CAN YOU TELL HOW DISAPPOINTED I AM IN YOU BIRKENSTOCK?! SHAME ON YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: miss kitty

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of birks that I could wear to the beach and not destroy. I was excited by the wide shade range amazon offered, and when I found the purple color I thought I would be getting I was even more excited. After I ordered the purple pair listed in the picture, I went back to see the delivery date and notice the picture changed, it was now neon pink. When I received them they were also neon pink. I would think that since these were fulfilled by amazon that they would be the exact product shown but I guess not. I will be ordering a plain white pair from someplace else instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I did not think I would like the material making up the sandal but it is ...
customer_reviews.text: A reasonable price on a birkie? yep. I did not think I would like the material making up the sandal but it is comfortable. I liked my first pair so much that I bought 2 more pairs for me and one for my daughter. They have the support of Birkenstocks but are waterproof. I wear them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: JANINE S.

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock comfort, plastic mud-resistance!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for a muddy music festival weekend! Fit like every pair of Birkenstocks I've ever worn, and could be quickly rinsed off as often as necessary. The footbed even gave pleasantly as I walked, almost like the cork I'm used to. It remains to be seen how long they'll last, but at a fraction of the price of traditional Arizonas, I won't mind if they don't last as long. These have already proven themselves a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H. Anbinder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I each have a pair! I love these for summer. You can just run them under the sink for a minute and voila they are clean as new! They are very comfy as well, they feel a lot like crocs. Birkenstock sizing is a little wonky. I wear a 7.5 US women's and always order a 36 wide in birks. Since these only come in narrow I went with a 37 since I do have somewhat wide feet. I can't wait to wear these to the beach
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: I've never given 5 stars before this review! UPDATE 2 STARS
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE AFTER TWO WEEKS OF USE: After regular beach and camp shoe wear they tore. UGH!!! I had such high expectations. I love Berks. (ORIGIONAL INITIAL REVIEW: I got to tell you I've never given a 5 star rating before. I LOVE theses. Thank God no more Crocs... Done get me wrong they had their use but now... I get the benefit of Birks in a Croc type material and it's more than expected. You get the great Birk sole that you come to love with that comfort in a VERY light weight material. I'm so glad I found these!!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Valler

customer_reviews.title: Okay, nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews have described this as the Birkenstock version of crocs, which is just about right. They are very lightweight with the good arch support of a Birkenstock. You even have to wear them a bit to break them in to your unique foot’s fit - much like the standard Birkenstock. I’m not wowed by them, and they are no substitute for the standard more expensive Birkenstock (worth every penny). They are adequate and I mainly wear them around the house. They’re also good for rainy weather walking. One little downside (although not a deal breaker), they have become kind of squeaky and noisy after wearing them about 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Liz M

customer_reviews.title: buy these!!! my new favorite birkenstock’s
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. extremely comfortable and definitely mold to your feet. I struggle getting sandals that fit my feet right as I have really wide feet. I normally size up because of this but in this instance I sized down. my actual foot length is an 8.5 but I ordered the 38. they have stretched a bit since wear but in my opinion it only helps the comfort. and yes, they will squeak if you have just gone in water but once they dry they stop. that is standard for rubber shoes
customer_reviews.author: nadine

customer_reviews.title: These are SOO GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE!! They are terrific! Great price, comfortable, durable and lightweight. If they get dirty, I just toss them in the sink or under the hose for a quick rinse and they dry quickly. They look like they might be heavy and bulky, but they really aren't! I almost got full cork & leather birks and I'm SOO glad I didn't because these are much more durable and can get wet and dirty without worry. They are also soo much cheaper! The bronze color is a nice natural color as well, not too shiny and or dull. LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.author: J. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Not worth even 20$
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. Your paying for the name but they are not the support giving Birkenstocks you think. Made of plastic foam. And ugly ugly. I usually don't return items from Amazon but I'm making an exception.
customer_reviews.author: MizzPassi

customer_reviews.title: For narrow feet these are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few different sandals I’m looking for a good pair to wear in my house because I have tile floors and these are amazing I have very narrow feet and they fit perfectly I recommend this for anyone who has narrow to average size feet since you can adjust with the buckles and I have it on the tightest setting because my feet are very narrow very comfortable true to size I’m an 8 1/2 so I got a 39 and you’re perfect
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable shoe and expensive for that quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks very cheap product, it might be not authentic. The brand name sign already gone and in the shoes after couple times wearing and either got some scratches on my toes. So lightweight that I was not expected and not comfortable, it was look like a leather in the picture, but it is not. It is more then look like a rubber sandals. Not worth the price. It is expensive for that quality
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Not Birkenstock quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. It barely held up a month. In fact I just barely missed the return window. The seam between the flap and front part of sole tore in both sides. It’s actually now a hazard to walk up the stairs as a few times the floppy front part will now catch the upper lip of the stairs. This is NOT quality you expect from Birkenstock
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Definitely supportive!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after visiting my podiatrist for Plantar fasciitis. I had no idea what a good shoe could do for your feet. They are very comfortable and fashionable with today’s style. Only thing I had troubles with when I initially started to wear them was the rubbing while the shoes adjusted to the width of my feet. Like most shoes-You got to break them in for proper fit. After that-I’ve had no issues with them. I wear them almost all day to avoid foot pain and they really do help.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn L.

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a flip flop alternative due to their arch support. They make noises as I walk that sound terrible. They can't get wet or you will be sliding all around in them. I wore them outside after I got them so I couldn't return them. I will be giving them away.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna L Young

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this version of the Birki. I have a pair, that has lasted for years, with a rubber sole and synthetic straps. I loved this style! Unfortunately they don’t make that style any more! 😏 I thought this would be the same, but sadly it was not. The whole Sandal was a foam type material. Very disappointed! I ordered another type of Birki with a traditional cork/leather sole and synthetic upper straps. I’m please with this but would much rather have the rubber sole.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of regular Birkenstocks because they always seem to hurt my feet with their harsh edges and uncomfortable foot bed. This is totally different! I love these! I have a pair to wear around the house as house shoes like a European. Sometimes I even wear them with socks to pull off the professor look as well. They have helped avoid plantar fasciitis on the hardwood floors as well. I actually can't stand walking around without them now. I was worried about the width when it said narrow but they are the perfect width. The material is easily washable (just rinse off). They come in many great colors although I love the silver/grey color.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Suspected Fake
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Birks and our family have been wearing them for years. My husbands EVA pair broke on the first time he wore them. The buckle attachment came out of the strap. My own EVA sandals are holding up just fine so I suspect these were a knock off. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jona

customer_reviews.title: Synthetic Birks!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Birkenstocks for over 30 years! I was afraid to try these at first, because they are a solid piece and not made of leather and cork. These are PERFECT! I couldn't tell that I was wearing a shoe any different than my regular Birks. This shoe is actually more comfortable because I didn't have to break in the footbed or soften the leather. I wish these came in narrow width, but all in all they are perfect! These can be thrown in the sink to wash... you can wear them right in the shower, river, pond, or wherever you would wear aqua shoes.
customer_reviews.author: katie bakken

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting a pair of these Berks and I could not find them available in regular width. Many of the reviews said the narrow had a lot of room so I gave it a go. When I first put them on I thought maybe I had made a mistake because they didn't have the same feel as regular Berks. It is a much softer support and much lighter. I have grown to love these Berks and can't imagine foot life without them. I still wear my regular Berks but honestly, I now wear these more. I think I might just have to get another pair in a wild color. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Give your feet love on wood floors!
customer_reviews.text: My podiatrist recommended these foam Birkies after I recovered from ankle surgery. My feet are so thankful. No more barefoot on hard surfaces. Wear thin socks as you break them in. I actually wear low socks full time and wear them all over. Find a true conversion chart for European sizes, and buy your true size. The 42s are 9 1/2. I returned the 43s because I'm not truly a 10, except in some shoe/boot brands, particularly in hiking boots. Enjoy! EDIT: BTW, my seller's return policy was great!!! ORVA STORES - Fulfilled by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckster

customer_reviews.title: Material gives blisters
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Birkenstocks for over 20 years so I understand how they fit. These immediately wore a blister on the top of my foot at my big toe joint on both feet. I only wore them to walk across from my building to the pool in my community. It's not even 30 feet away. I had to return. My mom ordered the same material but in the style that goes between the toes and it gave her a blister too in one day over to the pool.
customer_reviews.author: ohionative1980

customer_reviews.title: do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: poor construction/design...the material they are made of is not durable and split almost immediately. I was able to exchange them at a retail store for the exact same pair. Within no time the new pair also cracked. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M Burke

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried them on they felt great, the arch support was noticable. Really wanted to like them, but the material they are made of is very hard, after a few days the feet become incredibly sore.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended BUT...5Star?
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and the design although I’d like to have solid base because it feels like a soft plastic that deformed after 3 weeks. I’m 300lb 6’6 so perhaps it may last longer on smaller person. Also it’s squeegee and produce a fart noise make people pop those investigation eye like looking for the guilty!? make me want to do it twice back to back to let them know but for some reason it only happen when expected the least. I still 5 star but I wouldn’t buy it again. I enjoy them and they are light and comfy. Just hoping to see price drop so I can load up on them every couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Maybe Better Than Arizona?!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but for the price I had to check it out. I've owned birkenstocks for over 20 years. When I first received them I was sad because the box was light and I held them thinking plastic foamy flip flops, but I put them on and it was a great fit, then I walked around and was amazed how much support it gave my ankles and feet. I've had them for 3 or 4 weeks and worked outside, use inside house as my lounge shoes and use them for my walks around beach and countryside. I want to buy another pair, its just a matter of what color.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie D. Yapo

customer_reviews.title: May chafe your feet if they run as they are a plastic shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love how light these are but I'm getting blisters almost immediately where they seem to rub at the top, below my big toes on both feet, above where a bunion would be (but I don't have bunions). They just don't fit without rubbing below the big toes. I'd love them if they didn't I hire me minutes after putting them in. I'm using them for quick runs to water the plants and that's it. I'm disappointed as I've had many Birkenstocks before and they never caused blisters before. This material definitely runs no matter how I adjust the buckles at the top.
customer_reviews.author: VKB

customer_reviews.title: No Fart Noises Here  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄
customer_reviews.text: I love these and I live in them. No comfort or fit complaints. However, I’m sort of disappointed because I bought these sheerly because someone reviewed these shoes in a slightly negative light and said that they make fart noises every time they take a step. Now I’m not sure if this person has a couple of wet Easter hams for feet but I had no issue with these at all. And I’m slightly let down because I was hoping for one pffffft sound and I got bupkis.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock makes the best sandal in the world.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I am a 9 1/2 but I ordered a size 10 (female) and I am glad that I did - as a size 9 would’ve been too small. So I suggest that if you are a 1/2 size up, order the next whole size up. These are the best sandals in the world, and the plastic Tevas are a lot cheaper than the leather Arizonas that I had for years. This seems to be a high grade plastic - i.e. does NOT look junky. Highly recommend for people who have high arches and are looking for comfort and and a cool look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best affordable sandals!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beyond comfortable!!! I am a size 7-7.5 and I got the size 38. It fit comfortably. Gave me some arch support for my high arched feet. I can walk for a couple hours in them without getting tired. One advice though, if you drag your feet a lot... first of all, stop because it is not good for your posture, also any shoe that you wear will be damaged. Also if you get a size that is too big, you might end up dragging it, and ripping it like some of the people who posted rips by the straps and sole... it’s all up to you how you take care of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Oshun

customer_reviews.title: It took time but it feels good!
customer_reviews.text: So now I know the difference between the narrow vs regular in Birks. I really wanted these sandals so I went ahead and got the 38 N (I usually wear a 7 1/2 to 8) and this size was perfect for me. Now for the Narrow...I feel a little hump at the ball of my left foot that was very uncomfortable. However, overtime it has gotten better, I guess I have broken into the shoe and and it feels the hump smoothed out. I guess the Narrow carves out the foot width and that is why I was feeling the hump. But now it is very comfortable and glad I took the chance with getting these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Hurt at first but now perfect
customer_reviews.text: These really hurt my feet after wearing them to work the first time but now I don’t have foot pain after wearing them all day. They did give me blisters on the sides of both feet but I adjusted the straps and haven’t had any problems with rubbing since. After getting adjusted to these they are now really comfortable and my new summer go to sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: not a fan....
customer_reviews.text: So everyone described them a birkencrocs, more like adult hard jellies. they are bigger than described, ordered the 8-8,5 narrow, and I have very wide flat feet, they fit well width wise. However they are so long, there's an inch in the front and inch in the back. They also leave blisters and sores, crocs are usually a soft rubbery material that flexs well, these do not. I had Birkenstocks as a teen and loved them, but not sure about ordering a soft leather pair if they will be as ill fitting as these.
customer_reviews.author: krisnic

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool, good fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Arizona soft footbeds and these are a similar fit. They aren't as conforming because of the material, but the sizing is appropriate. These are extremely lightweight and perfect for the pool, beach, and gardening. I wear between a 7.5 & 8 women's in US sizing, and the 38 Narrow Birkenstocks fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love birks but didnt like that I couldnt wear them in the water. Found these and its the best of both world's.
customer_reviews.author: Pennylane

customer_reviews.title: Not for them sweaty feet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted these shoes for years and have recently received them as a birthday gift, they deliver the same fantastic arch support that I’ve come to expect from Birkenstock and match everything! I am glad to have the comfort of a birk and not have to worry about wearing them to the pool or beach. With all that said there is only one draw back..... THEY SQUEAK NON-STOP! It really is a constant, there’s nothing sly about these shoes. Keeping that in mind they are still wonderful - I just might recommend them to someone who’s feet don’t sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Ljung

customer_reviews.title: So uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I know birks are tough to get used to, but I think that is usually only with the foot support. These have metal "buttons" on the inside that holds the buckle and it rubs on my toes. Wore them for a few hours around the house to start to break them in and everytime I put them back on to try again the tops of my toes scream out in protest. It rubs them to the point that my fourth toe on both feet is bright red. Wish I could return, I know that good birkenstocks don't have that button. So bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not breathable
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived ok, but not for me. These are solid foam which means 1.) they don’t breathe (hot feet!) and 2.) they are hair magnets. Just trying them on I had dog and human hair from my floor static-clinging to them. Now I know how dirty my floors are. They are also darker than they appear in the photo - more brown.
customer_reviews.author: T Sam

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these several years ago. I was a little surprised to see Birkenstock (with a well-deserved reputation for quality) in what looked like plastic. They were on closeout for about $10 so I figured what the heck. I was pleasantly surprised at their comfort. Over the years they have held up very well. This new pair is just for backup; the original pair is going strong with no damage and very few signs of wear. EVA foam is not plastic; whatever it is, it is very comfortable and durable. Verdict: BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plume

customer_reviews.title: Not My Birkenstock’s!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my regular Birkenstock’s!! I own many pairs and have worn them for years. I needed some sandals for the pool area so I thought these would be great. They look okay, but I was so disappointed with the comfort level. The material is tough and uncomfortable. They make my feet hurt!! They got tossed in my Goodwill basket. I do have issues with my feet that’s why I love my regular Birkenstock’s, but these sandals do not make the grade for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My wife got a pair of these for me and another pair for herself. Initially I was very willing to wear them because of the design - not the prettiest pair of sandals in my eyes. But after trying them a couple of times, I started to like them. They are just so light, yet wraps around my feet so well, I feel like I'm walking on clouds. It's not something I would wear in the public but they are now my first choice to wear around the house.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zheng

customer_reviews.title: perfect for water and beaches
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a vacation in Florida and then to use at my local pool in the shower. They didn't get beat up on the beaches with shells, etc. and they are almost as comfy as my regular Birks. They do make a squeaky sound when they get wet but other than that, they are definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: Great for the house!
customer_reviews.text: They feel cheaply made at first but then the shoes grow on you emotionally (not physically because that would be magical). They are super light and my feet feels supported. We have hard floors (no carpet) so I wear them around the house all day. Now I love them and won’t wear other slippers.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the narrow width designation stop you from buying the shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a narrow but fit my wide feet pretty well. I wear a size 9 but ordered an 8-8.5 because a 9-9.5 would ha e been too big. The middle of the footbed is a little narrow but I only walked a few feet in them. The only thing I don’t like about them is the cheap, plastic white buckle. I think it definitely detracts from the shoe. A matching buckle would make the shoes a lot more attractive. I may take some nail polish and paint them.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I'm literally obsessed with these. You can dress them up or down. I wore them for an entire run of a show. I get so many compliments on these every time I wear them. Very comfortable. They match with everything. Highly recommend. I was nervous because I saw a lot of people's breaking, but like I said I do musical theatre and I wore them as my show shoes for over a month... no breaking. I wear them to run the stairs at my office... no breaking. so I think you should buy them.
customer_reviews.author: CourtNico

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Heard these tend to run a hair large. I wear between a 10 and 11 - 10 fit very well for me. All plastic, as advertised, and from a single molded piece. Extremely light weight, but (odd to say this for a sandal) doesn't breath at all, so wears hot on my foot. The molded in toe lines (for the big toe) land right where my big toe lands. I suspect it will break in over time but isn't particularly comfortable out of the box with the ridge right under my toe. Not disappointed up front - I hope they wear well and last long enough to live up to the brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E Beaty

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS SANDAL
customer_reviews.text: COULD NOT GET IT IN WHITE WITHOUT BEING SENT FROM ENGLAND.. my last pair has lasted more than 7 years.. live in the tropics so i can walk right into the ocean with these.. get many compliments..am addicted to birkenstocks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Regular model fits wide, but footbed is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I returned these for a Narrow with hopes that the Narrow fits perfectly. The 41 Regular is really wide for my average width feet, and perhaps a tiny bit too long. But mostly way too wide. The box they came in indicates that this model comes in Narrow and Regular. That was not clear when I ordered. Updated: The arch support on the 41 narrow extended too far forward. I bought a 40, thinking it was regular width (as it was not advertised as narrow and I did not look, and it has turned out to be almost perfect. So the 40 narrow fits me like a womens 10.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband specifically because of our hardwood floors. He was very hesitant and did not want to order them but I convinced him by reading him some of the reviews. He loves them, hasn’t taken them off since they arrived! Highly recommend if you are in need of a comfortable shoe. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Johana

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals. lightweight and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals.lightweight and durable. My only gripe is how slippery/slimey feeling they are when wet..or when your feet sweat in the summer. When t5his happens, black stuff smears off the material and stains the bottoms of your feet which is difficult to scrub off ..otherwise these are quite nice and comfy and worth the little hassle.
customer_reviews.author: MCJM

customer_reviews.title: A MUST
customer_reviews.text: A huge percentage of ER injuries result from ... flip flops! As a swimmer, I wanted to find something with tread, and support to help prevent falls. These are not only safe, they are adorable. I've had mine for 1.5 years, and they look brand new. I wear them 5x/wk to the pool. Even though they're a light color, they look great! No stains.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Garwood

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoes for summer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in black, and at first glance you would think they are leather. I have worn Birkis for years, and I like these just as well or better than my old ones. The fit is exactly like the leather Arizonas, and the footbed is just as comfortable, maybe more so. It is wonderful that they are waterproof, for pool and beach wear, and they are so lightweight that they will be perfect to pack for summer trips. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: abqbev

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock EVA Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly (👍🏻-well done on that) but was somewhat disappointed on the support and comfort level (they gave me a couple of blisters right away). Not nearly as comfortable as the leather cork version (I absolutely love the Arizona style of the leather/cork ones) and they are not even close to arch support). While they're semi-comfortable, I'll probably only wear them around the house-they clearly are not meant to wear outside on a walk. *sigh*
customer_reviews.author: oes_fan

customer_reviews.title: Too wide!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in black 8.5 narrow and find them a little to ‘exact’, with no much space and afraid that when I walked, my toes would go out haha. So I bought the same in size 9N in white because the black was out of stock... Not only does it fit too big, it also fits too wide! Even tightening the straps,I still have a lot of room around, def won’t work for me. Also, my feet look huge! Will be sending back and I’ll just use the 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Treviño Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Best sandal EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This sandal is waterproof, washable, ultra lightweight & has great support due to the footbed Birkenstock is known for! The regular size was out of stock so I purchased a narrow which terrified me but I needed them for vacation BUT THEY FIT! I love these so much, for pool or even for a fancy outing with a dress. These literally go with everything & I would highly suggest for anyone looking for a trusty vacay sandal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sledge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They’re the perfect water/beach/summer shoes! Completely waterproof and super comfy. They’ve held up well even wearing them into the ocean. They’re super light weight and easy to clean as well. I’m on my second pair after sadly the front part flipped under itself and cracked the rubber edge but complete user error; i had had those shoes for 2 years prior to that incident. Will definitely be repurchasing when I wear these ones out!
customer_reviews.author: KRamos147

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe but defective - beware
customer_reviews.text: The good: these started out as the perfect shoe for just about everything in the summer. The fit was perfect (I had to get the narrow but they worked perfectly). I wore them for a few weeks and started to think they would be the only shoe I wear for 6 months out of the year. The bad: after just a few weeks of wearing them a huge split started by the big toe area. Really wanted these to work out, but had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: Just as comfy as regular Birkenstocks
customer_reviews.text: I wear regular Birkenstock sandals every day during the warm-weather months. I have some foot pain but can walk pain-free all day in my Birks. These EVA Birks provide the same pain-free comfort, despite having a much more flexible sole than the regular cork sandals. My feet do sweat in them, given that they're not made of natural materials. But that's the only complaint I have.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Grey

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have regular birkenstocks, but I am afraid of getting them wet doing stuff around the house and watering plants outside. These are the perfect solution for that! They are true to Birkenstock sizing and comfortable, they obviously feel different that the normal birkenstock's but they are just as comfortable and offer the same support. I love that I am able to clean them off in the sink and let them air dry, they look brand new after a quick rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Not the usual quality of Birkenstock
customer_reviews.text: I have the same style from Kohl's called Mudd. I wanted to get a better quality pair, and I am used to buying Birkenstock sandals- the cork ones. Thinking I would have a much more sturdy and supportive sandal, instead, these are thin, have much less arch support, and seem cheaply made. I'll stick with the ones from Kohls that were $12, and have great arch support and a thicker sturdier sole.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mikolajczyk

customer_reviews.title: this is the cheap Birky. Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband needs something in the house that is comfortable on this feet and used to wear the leather regular Birkenstocks. He is so hard on shoes because of the way he walks that we are always buying Birks and specially made sneakers. So when I saw these at around $25 we decided to try them. As long as one thinks of them as slippers or beach or gardening sandals, you will be very happy. I have many, many pairs of Birkenstocks. It is a brand I trust and here in AZ we must have sandals! The Arizona model just happens to be the most versatile, so I have lots of them.
customer_reviews.author: Gini

customer_reviews.title: Just like classic Birks
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical as I've only had the classic cork footbed style but I LOVE these. They are almost as comfortable as my regular Birks but have held up amazingly and don't absorb my embarrassing foot odor (that have ruined countless pair of classic birks). The only slight negative is that because of the material, the footbed is more flexible and if you catch the toe wrong the shoe will bend like a flip flop. But I wear these daily, indoor and out and really REALLY like them.
customer_reviews.author: JaimeRC

customer_reviews.title: If they don't feel good at first adjust the straps
customer_reviews.text: I'm still deciding if I absolutely love these or if they're just not right for me....They have great support, but I've had some discomfort, mostly on the top of my feet. I have a fairly narrow foot with a high instep, so if the strap is too tight it digs into the top of my foot. The inside sole has it's own molding, not like leather Birks which will mold to you, when I first put them on in the morning it can be a little off, but over the course of the day it improves. I'm not sending them back and I've been wearing them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia E.

customer_reviews.title: Love my rubber berkies
customer_reviews.text: They feel great with or without socks. I absolutely love them. I have plantar faciaitis, bunion and low arches. These are the only shoes I can wear pain free. In the down side, after about 6 months they started wearing out and split. I can still wear them but disappointed In that. I am buying another pair only because they are so comfortable. I own a pair of leather Birkenstock’s that are equally as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: FAKES
customer_reviews.text: So I haven’t worn these for a week and as you could see the color inside is already faded and I have two others from DSW that I literally have been wearing since summer and the inside writing is still in tact. So now I’m of the thought that these aren’t real wish I could return them I started wear these last Sat and look at this mess. Really unhappy hate being ripped off
customer_reviews.author: Smaller

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for my feet
customer_reviews.text: when I took these sandals on I had high hopes because I've worn Birkenstock before and they've been very good. However, I slipped these onto my feet and they only felt like very hard plastic. There wasn't enough arch support for my feet and when I walked around in them they were hard and uncomfortable. Disappointed, but undaunted. I'll continue my search for comfortable sandals. please bear in mind that this review is only for me, and for my feet. Your mileage may vary. You might love them, don't let my reviews keep you from trying them if you think they will work
customer_reviews.author: Seana L Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing & cute as heck!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting a pair of birkenstock’s for years & these have definitely met my expectations! They fit perfect & are super cute/ go very well with many outfits! I chose the plain black color (to match more of my clothing 😂) & even being the cheapest pair they are still HIGHLY recommended! Definitely ordering a few more pairs as these have proven more than excellent! Only con is i wish there was a bit more cushioning in the soles (though that might affect the aesthetic pleasure)
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Birkenstock lover for the last two decades. I was very happy when these lightweight waterproof ones came out. They of course don't last as long as the leather ones, but they are just as comfortable. I like these so much that I ordered a second pair of the women's narrow for my son, who we have trouble finding sandals for because his feet are so skinny. The bright blue are perfect for him and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage. Don’t pay for a dumb name.
customer_reviews.text: I truly regret this purchase. I bought them to have something for the beach. They were uncomfortable, squeaky, loud. The logo faded quickly. I regret the waste of money so much. I really hate myself for buying this. When I was packing to return home, I abandoned these slippers at the hotel so I can make some space for other items I got. Literally they are in a trash can in less than a month. Don’t believe other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Brawn

customer_reviews.title: These are uncomfortable& bc the material they won’t form to your arch of your foot. Blisters!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so uncomfortable. For all the noise around about Birkenstock’s- I believe these are probably not the most comfortable- (my first pair of birks) but I think the cork based pairs must be more comfortable. These rubbed blisters on the top of my foot and with little flexibility as you walk you have zero arch support and actual restriction.. unless you make them so lose they don’t touch the top of the foot at all- but then what’s the point in that? If they’re for the beach or short time periods they are ok. But better than using plastic & I’d choose eco friendly over anything
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: This is a forgery
customer_reviews.text: I should have known from the price. $32 for Birkenstocks? What I received was incredibly lightweight. The entire shoe was rubber. No cork material, no leather. They came with the word "Birk" imprinted all over the sole, and the box looks like an authentic Birkenstock box, but these shows are absolutely not real Birkenstocks. I'm sending them back, and I'm a bit pissed at Amazon for carrying forged merchandise. Oh yeah, I just placed an order for real Birkenstocks from Birkenstock.com, $99, free shipping and returns. Amazon is not your friend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Frost

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a "test pair" of Birkenstocks. I wasn't willing to invest triple digits in shoes until I knew they were right for me. I have plantar fasciitis, and many shoes just make matters worse. Not these. They help with the condition and also give the bone spur that resulted from the problem, immediate relief. One note, the straps are made of the same vinyl as the soles, so they can be a tad hard on the top of your big toe. I put some moleskin on the interior and it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Connie N.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple pairs of these and wore the black ones so much that the sole was wearing through. They're so comfortable and I can wear them out doing gardening work and just rinse them off. I was so happy to be able to get them again - I got 3 pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I had moderate expectations for these shoes, but these are arguably the best things for my pronated feet since the original cork and leather 'stocks. The EVA construction is supremely versatile and durable and does not appear cheesy. I wore these on extensive walks and think they would also work well at the beach since the fit is adjustable for maximum precision. The comfort, light construction, and versatility of application and appearance have made them my ultimate travel shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Cerulean05

customer_reviews.title: Work fine, but I'm 99% sure they aren't authentic
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my birthday and they just seem cheaply made. Compared to the ones I've seen in person the material isn't quite the same and these are much more light weight than the others. There are edges that aren't clean. It looks like the substance they are made of leaked through the casting mold and no one cared to clean up the end result. I'm 99% sure these are fake.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these sandals and I love them. They’re great for going to the beach or long walks. They have enough support and cushioning that I can wear them all day without needing to change shoes. I’ve bought cheaper versions and found its better to spend up. These last longer and have way better support and cushioning. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Geniusness0419

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and SO comfortable. The regular Birkenstock cork sole sandals are actually too hard for my personal comfort so I opted for these, and they're just the best. Plenty of foamy cushion below the feet to make walking feel as though you're on clouds. Don't want to wear any other shoes if I don't have to!
customer_reviews.author: gla

customer_reviews.title: I've always loved this sandal
customer_reviews.text: I generally where only Birkenstock sandals, weather permitting, as they're the only shoe I can wear due to continuous plantar fasciitis. I've always loved this sandal, however, in too short of time they develop vertical breaks or tears in the arc of the strap toward the shin, especially in the patent leather and metallic styles. Keep this in mind when purchasing. It's surprising and disappointing considering the high price and quality expected in this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lenora

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these Birks!
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with these birks. Since they are rubber, they're easy to wash off. I actually bought these for college and community bathrooms, but I've been wearing these every single day since I've received them. I absolutely love them. Also, they are true to size. I would recommend going out to a store that sells birks and trying different sizes on first because they have different sizing. I usually wear women's 7.5, but 39 is a little too big while 38 is too perfect for me. However, I ended up sizing up for more comfort, but it ended up working out:)
customer_reviews.author: ysp

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort has gone down!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same waterproof sandals a couple of years ago. These Birchenstock Eva sandals lasted until now. The seller was very nice, helping me figure out which width I had bought and needed. The problem is that these wonderful sandals from a couple of years ago are no longer make as comfortable. The arche is not thick and cushioned now and does not provide enough support for my problem feet. I am very sorry to say I cannot find a decent pair of waterproof sandals on Amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.author: FED-UP

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, not like the first pair I bought at Dick's
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar pair at Dick's last year and the material was soft but very supportive., they were a great sandal so I was looking for another pair. What I got was not at all what I expected. This sandal is hard and not supportive at all so if you have problems with your feet, I would definitely steer clear. These are very cheaply made and are not worth the the 40 dollars. They are not worth $5. Yep, & I missed the window to return. Theses sandals suck!
customer_reviews.author: jlkjoyful

customer_reviews.title: Cleanable Birks at a great price and in any color
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea! EVA Birkenstocks that you can clean and are relatively cheap! Definitely get a pair of these. But I actually got these for another reason. I have a leg length discrepancy (of 1/2 inch), and haven't been able to do a full yoga routine. So I got these and put one on the short leg, allowing the other foot to remain bare. Turns out these are absolutely perfect. I drilled extra holes in the straps to tighten them as much as possible. They're lightweight, cleanable, molded to the foot, love these things. Well, the right foot anyway.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mihalovits

customer_reviews.title: Groove Chick
customer_reviews.text: Like that they are comfortable, vegan and not made in China! Made my size 10 feet look huge, so I returned them. Ordered the 41N and they were a tiny bit long and for my medium-width B foot, had the straps on the tightest fitting.
customer_reviews.author: MARY S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love Birkenstocks. I have quite a few but never the Eva. I have a pool out in the backyard and garden and I can wear these and they wash right off. They are very comfortable. I wore them grocery shopping too, and could wear them all day. Only downside is if your feet get wet or sweaty they will make a suction noise when walking, lol. Oh well! Cant beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Size Down. Ok But Returned Them.
customer_reviews.text: I returned these shoes, but wanted to share the pros and cons of them: Pros: -They were incredibly comfortable and felt really supportive. -They were very lightweight Cons: -They look like cartoon character or toddler shoes. The black ones or the brown ones with the black buckle may be ok but the ones with the white buckles look really weird. -They made a weird suctiony noise when you walked. -The quality doesn’t make them seem like $45 shoes. I am a true women’s size 6 in all shoes; I read the reviews and decided to size down to a size 5 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Birkenstocks!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these sandals for husband, son and myself. They are super comfortable. I love that we don’t have to break them in or baby them like our leather versions. I typically wear a size 41 in Birkenstocks but these run a tad long. I could easily wear a 40 in these. I really love that all three pairs (husband’s, son’s and mine) cost what I typically spend on one leather pair.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Hardman

customer_reviews.title: BirkenCrocs
customer_reviews.text: I bought the narrow in women’s 10.5. They fit left foot perfect but I know right foot is a little flatter, so taking some time to get used to the the support. Pretty comfy, but sweaty. Perfect to just slip on and go. If you have narrow feet, I definitely recommend the narrow fit. They don’t flop. I love that they are adjustable. Basically glorified. Crocs.
customer_reviews.author: MicheleAm

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Great except for the Strap popping off
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sandals. They fit well - they are comfortable & affordable. The only problem I've had with these sandals is the top strap which keeps popping off. And of course it didn't do this till it was too late to return or exchange them. I hadn't even worn them very much so I was surprised and a bit disappointed. I'll probably give it a dab of super glue and hopefully that will be that.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

product_meta.title: BIRKENSTOCK Unisex Arizona Essentials EVA Sandals
feature_bullets: Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed in EVA
More Toe Room. Allows toes to move anturally, which promites better balance and foot alignment
Raised Toe bar. Encourages natural gripping motion of your feet, exercises the legs and stimulates circulation
Contoured Footbed. Four arches ensure even weight distribution and proper posture
Deep Heel Cup. Cradles the heel and keeps natural cushioning right under the heel bone.
